trans-unit.source: Defines the constraints set on a certificate.
trans-unit.target: 定義憑證上設定的條件約束。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This class provides properties that define the basic constraints set on a certificate.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會提供定義基本的條件約束的屬性設定的憑證。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509BasicConstraintsExtension"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509BasicConstraintsExtension"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509BasicConstraintsExtension"></xref> class using an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object and a value that identifies whether the extension is critical.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509BasicConstraintsExtension"></xref>類別使用<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref>物件，可識別副檔名是否為重要的值。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor if the information to create an extension is already in an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果已在要建立擴充功能的資訊，請使用這個建構函式<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData>

trans-unit.source: The encoded data to use to create the extension.
trans-unit.target: 要用來建立擴充功能編碼的資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the extension is critical; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果延伸模組是關鍵的;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509BasicConstraintsExtension"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509BasicConstraintsExtension"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Parameters specify a value that indicates whether a certificate is a certificate authority (CA) certificate, a value that indicates whether the certificate has a restriction on the number of path levels it allows, the number of levels allowed in a certificate's path, and a value that indicates whether the extension is critical.
trans-unit.target: 參數指定值，指出憑證是否為憑證授權單位 (CA) 憑證，而值，指出是否將憑證路徑層級數目有限制接受，憑證的路徑和值，指出是否為重要延伸模組中允許的層級數目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the certificate is a certificate authority (CA) certificate; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果憑證是憑證授權單位 (CA) 憑證，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the certificate has a restriction on the number of path levels it allows; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果憑證的路徑層級數目有限制它可讓;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The number of levels allowed in a certificate's path.
trans-unit.target: 憑證的路徑中允許的層級數目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the extension is critical; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果延伸模組是關鍵的;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a certificate is a certificate authority (CA) certificate.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出憑證是否為憑證授權單位 (CA) 憑證。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine if the certificate is a certificate authority (CA) certificate.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來判斷憑證是否為憑證授權單位 (CA) 憑證。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the certificate is a certificate authority (CA) certificate, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果憑證是憑證授權單位 (CA) 憑證，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509BasicConstraintsExtension"></xref> class using an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509BasicConstraintsExtension"></xref>類別使用<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor if the information to create an extension is already in an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果已在要建立擴充功能的資訊，請使用這個建構函式<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData>

trans-unit.source: The encoded data to use to create the extension.
trans-unit.target: 要用來建立擴充功能編碼的資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a certificate has a restriction on the number of path levels it allows.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出憑證是否具有它所允許的路徑層級數目的限制。

trans-unit.source: A certificate issuer can restrict the number of levels in a certificate path.
trans-unit.target: 憑證簽發者可以限制憑證路徑中的層級的數目。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates whether the certificate has this restriction.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會指出憑證是否有這項限制。

trans-unit.source: If this value is `true`, you can use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509BasicConstraintsExtension.PathLengthConstraint%2A> property to determine the number of levels allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值為`true`，您可以使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509BasicConstraintsExtension.PathLengthConstraint%2A>屬性來判斷允許的層級數目。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509BasicConstraintsExtension.PathLengthConstraint%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the certificate has a restriction on the number of path levels it allows, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果憑證具有它允許，否則路徑層級數目的限制<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The extension cannot be decoded.
trans-unit.target: 無法解碼的延伸模組。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of levels allowed in a certificate's path.
trans-unit.target: 取得憑證的路徑中允許的層級數目。

trans-unit.source: If a certificate has a constraint on the number of path levels it allows, this property indicates how many levels are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果憑證路徑允許的層級數目的條件約束，這個屬性會指出允許多少層級。

trans-unit.source: An integer indicating the number of levels allowed in a certificate's path.
trans-unit.target: 表示允許的憑證路徑中的層級數目的整數。

trans-unit.source: The extension cannot be decoded.
trans-unit.target: 無法解碼的延伸模組。
